comments.comment: Missing using statement for Aula.Core.Models namespace which is needed for the Child type
Uses forbidden emoji ❌ in log message. Per documentation standards, only ❌, ✅, and ⚠️ emojis are allowed, but they should be avoided in code
comments.suggested_fix: Remove emoji from log message: _logger.LogError("No pictograms found on page");

comments.comment: Uses forbidden emoji ❌ in log message
Uses forbidden emoji ✅ in log message
Uses forbidden emoji ❌ in log message
Uses forbidden emoji ✅ in log message

Good architectural cleanup extracting ChildAuthenticatedClient as a standalone class and removing Config dependencies from authentication clients. The hardcoded URLs align with Option A's approach of removing configuration dependencies from authentication layer
The IChildAuthenticatedClient interface is properly implemented by both ChildAuthenticatedClient and PictogramAuthenticatedClient, maintaining consistency across authentication methods
PerChildMinUddannelseClient correctly acts as a pure orchestration facade, delegating authentication to the appropriate client based on authentication type (pictogram vs standard)

missing_requirements.requirement: Missing using statement for Aula.Core.Models in ChildAuthenticatedClient.cs
